title: The Organization and Financing of the US Health Care System
description: This course will introduce students to organizations that make up the US health care system and will cover how health care in the US is organized and financed and how this compares with other countries around the world. The implications of the increasingly large role played by health systems in health care and the implications of system growth for quality, equity, and cost will also be discussed. Prerequisites: successfully completed FMPH 405.
